content.question: The conflict described in the excerpt led primarily to which of the following changes in Spanish colonial policy?

choices.label: Scaling back of the Spanish presence in North America
Widespread use of warfare to maintain control of Native Americans
Removal of Native Americans to reservations
Greater accommodation to Native American cultures

content.answer: Greater accommodation to Native American cultures

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
